/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The vantage point is from a high angle, providing a bird's eye view of the urban landscape below. The street, teeming with life, is lined with a variety of buildings and trees, their green foliage contrasting with the concrete structures. Cars and buses traverse the road, adding a dynamic element to the scene. The sky above is a clear blue, with the sun shining brightly, casting a warm glow over the entire scene.
